gridtype  = projection

xsize     = 450
ysize     = 488
xname     = rlon
xlongname = "rotated longitude"
xunits    = "degrees"
yname     = rlat
ylongname = "rotated latitude"
yunits    = "degrees"
xfirst    = -29.805
xinc      = 0.11
yfirst    = -24.805
yinc      = 0.11
